Text:
This is a nice quality hi-def broadcast saved in MKV format.

However, on my less than high-end system, VLC couldn't play it.  Very choppy, and for minutes at a time the picture freezes (the sound plays alright).

I found another good copy in AVI format that plays perfectly (though it's not hi-def):

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5346929/EPL.2010.02.07.Chelsea.Vs.Arsenal.WS.PDTV.XviD-OTVhttp://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5346929/EPL.2010.02.07.Chelsea.Vs.Arsenal.WS.PDTV.XviD-OTV
